item.title: Apple Park Visitor Center's Rooftop Terrace is Temporarily Closed
item.description: If you are planning to head to the Apple Park Visitor Center this month, be aware that the rooftop terrace will be temporarily closed. Apple says the rooftop terrace will be receiving some unspecified
